title: Android Update October 2019 Broken
content:
I updated to the October 2019 patch this morning.

When it updated it stayed at a black screen that I had to force restart to fix. Upon restarting here are the issues:

No notifications are showing up at all.
Swipe gestures are not working (i.e. home button, app switcher). I've tried all 3 and only back works. Home and app switch does not 
All of my settings were reset to default.
Dark mode doesn't work.

If I find more I'll update.
